description: J-Tech Digital (registered US trademark)proudly introduces this latest generation Hdmi To Hdmi + 3.5mm Stereo (RCA L/R) Audio Extractor Converter. It is known that the most benefit of the HDMI technology is to integrate the audio and video signals together. This integration makes all of us enjoy the high quality of the audio and video effect. Awfully the bad effect of the HDTV audio deprives the basic right of the enthusiasts. Fortunately, we develop this new product eventually, not only to meet the ideal image of the HDTV but also to meet the need of the enthusiasts' requirement for audio. Because it can extract the audio signal from the HDMI interface, then transmit audio to the Amplifier Receiver by 3.5 mm or RCA L/R cables. This device will extract the digital audio signal from the HDMI input and convert it to 2 channel analog stereo.Features: HDMI input converts to 3.5 mm or RCA L/R output for audio and HDMI output for video Supports audio output simultaneously: Stereo. Supports 2.0 channel audio. Supports the highest video resolution to 1080p. Supports 225MHz/2.25Gbps per channel (6.75Gbps all channel) bandwidth. Supports 12bit per channel (36bit all channel) deep color. Supports HDCP. Support 3D all format, including 1080p@23.98/24Hz, 720p@59.94/60Hz/50Hz, bandwidth up to 225MHz.Support 3D video (To get 3D, all units connected to the splitter outputs must support 3D)This item supports Apple TV and various Blu-ray player and satellite receivers.Additional Info:Free lifetime technical support from the manufacture and free 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty from J-Tech Digital.
title: J-Tech Digital (Registered Us Trademark) Premium Quality Hdmi To Hdmi + 3.5mm Stereo (RCA L/R) Audio Extractor Converter
